name: delivery-agent
description: An example of a delivery agent that estimates delivery dates.

scripts.agent: node --experimental-json-modules -e "import('./agent.js').then( module => module.runAgent({customerId: '1', customerName: 'Clark Kent', customerAddress: '1a Goldsmiths Row, London E2 8QA', productDescription: 'Superman T-Shirt', productAvailability: 'AVAILABLE', warehouseAddress: 'Unit 1 Cairnrobin Way, Portlethen, Aberdeen AB12 4NJ'})).catch(console.error);"

author: Orra Team
